channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-2145] bin/hbase org.apache.hadoop.hbase.PerformanceEvaluation --miniCluster randomRead 1 don't work
item.description:
I see this in the 0.20.3RC. Its been there a while I'd guess. Not enough to sink RC I'd say. In fact, all PE args could do with a review.


...

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
